name: Config 2022 Name Badge – Chad Behnke
description:
I’m a visual designer and illustrator currently in Chicago originally from the Wisconsin northwoods 🌲🧀. I love using my creative passions to foster an environment of learning, engagement, and fun! I create art that embodies kitsch in new and interesting ways. 🛸🎡⛱

If I’m not creating, you can find me enjoying sci-fi and fantasy films and shows 🤖📺, gaming 👾🎮, making/drinking Bloody Marys 💉🍹, and exploring our universe 🚀🌌!
